template.name: Z-Matrix
template.comment:
Z-matrix (autoz) --------
Units are Angstrom for bonds and degrees for angles
Type Name I J K L M Value ----------- -------- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- ---------- 1 Stretch 1 2 1.80680 .. 10 Stretch 8 11 1.15200 11 Bend 2 1 6 90.00000 .. 37 Bend 11 1 7 120.00000 38 Torsion 1 2 6 9 180.00000 .. 55 Torsion 1 8 7 10 180.00000
